title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: A novel set in the Jazz Age that explores themes of wealth, love, and the American Dream.

author: George Orwell
description: A dystopian novel depicting a totalitarian society under constant surveillance.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: A story of racial injustice and moral growth in the American South.

title: The Hobbit
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: A classic fantasy novel about Bilbo Baggins' adventure to reclaim a treasure from a dragon.

title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
description: A book on how small habits can lead to remarkable results over time.

title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
description: A philosophical novel about following one's dreams and discovering one's destiny.

title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
author: Yuval Noah Harari
description: A deep dive into the history of humankind, exploring evolution, culture, and progress.

title: Rich Dad Poor Dad
author: Robert T. Kiyosaki
description: A book that challenges conventional money management and teaches financial literacy.

title: Dune
author: Frank Herbert
description: A sci-fi masterpiece about a desert planet and the battle for its valuable resource, spice.

title: The Psychology of Money
author: Morgan Housel
description: A book that explores how people think about money and financial decision-making.
